trans-unit.source: Stores and retrieves the message encoding format of incoming and outgoing messages for the composite Web message encoder.
trans-unit.target: 為複合 Web 訊息編碼器儲存及擷取傳入和傳出訊息的訊息編碼格式。

trans-unit.source: This property allows, for example, the composite Web message formatter to know how the composite Web message encoder has encoded the message.
trans-unit.target: 例如，這個屬性可讓複合 Web 訊息格式器了解複合 Web 訊息編碼器編碼訊息的方式。

trans-unit.source: Objects that implement this interface are added by value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties%2A> with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name> providing the access key.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面的物件，會透過提供便捷鍵 (Access Key) 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties%2A> 根據值新增至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" /> class with a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The format cannot be set to the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat.Default" /> value in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 無法在建構函式中將格式設定為 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat.Default" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current instance of the current property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前屬性的目前執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty" /> interface that is a copy of the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty" /> 之複本的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" /> 介面執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the format used for the message body.
trans-unit.target: 取得訊息本文使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat" /> that specifies the format used for the message body.
Returns the name of the property.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty> object must have the name "WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" as its key in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties> collection for the value to be accessed and used as a processing annotation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty> 物件必須具有名稱 "WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" 做為它在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties> 集合中的索引鍵，如此它的值才能被存取並做為處理附註。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the property and the encoding format used when constructed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回建構時使用的屬性名稱和編碼格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns "WebBodyFormatMessageProperty: EncodingFormat={0}", where {0} is <see langword="WebContentFormat.ToString()" />, which specifies the encoding format used.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 "WebBodyFormatMessageProperty: EncodingFormat={0}"，其中 {0} 為 <see langword="WebContentFormat.ToString()" />，指定所使用的編碼格式。
